main event: On 9 August 1950, an unidentified object emitting a greenish glow hovered over Ramey AFB in Puerto Rico, moving very slowly before disappearing downward.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be slightly smaller than expected,It emitted a greenish glow and hovered slowly,No sound was reported during the sighting,The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes,The estimated speed of the object was 5 knots.
witness description: US Air Force personnel observing from Ramey AFB
